feed.title: Jake Zimmerman | Data
feed.subtitle: A collection of blog posts about programming, software, types, programming languages, Sorbet, Vim, Markdown, and more.

entry.title: Presenting Data & Information: Notes
entry.summary: On Monday, December 4th, I went to Edward Tufte's one-day course on 'Presenting Data & Information.' I'm glad I went, and there were a number of things I took away from the day.
